name: 蕭榮修
objective:
介紹計算機演算法的設計與分析，內容包含了：函數成長，遞迴關係，排序及序列統計，基礎與進階資料結構，動態規劃，貪婪演算法，搜尋，圖形與幾何演算法，字串比對，NP-completeness, 近似演算法，及平行與分散式演算法.
This course gives a broad introduction about the design and analysis of computer algorithms. General topics to be covered include: growth of functions, recurrences, sorting and order statistics, fundamental and advanced data structures, dynamic programming, greedy algorithms, searching, graph and geometry algorithms, string matching, NP-completeness, approximation algorithms, parallel and distributed algorithms.
